ref.title: Density and Viscosity for Binary Mixtures of the Ionic Liquid 1-Butyl-3-methylimidazolium Tetrafluoroborate with 2-Propanol, N,N-Dimethylacetamide and N,N-Dimethylformamide at 293.15-323.15 K: Experimental and PC-SAFT Modeling

sample: 0.02 water mass %(dried by vacuum heating;fractional distillation)
